text:
@realDonaldTrump .
To be fair, Trump gets recognition for his actions on #coronavirus from an unexpected source, John Oliver.

For a balanced view, we should all watch this, especially the part where he slams Iran and he slams Obama even harder
.
https://t.co/D7J7GA1eUL
